Html: I've used PHPExel for a couple projects and it's worked fine but it doesn't seem to like using radio buttons. I'm using PHPExcel to quickly record data in an Excel sheet and when I use regular buttons with a set of predefined values, it works flawlessly but whenever I try to use a form with radio buttons and a text field which works for a few reports but then the error "Fatal error: Class 'PHPExcel_Shared_Escher_DggContainer' not found in C:\xampp\htdocs\CCWorkMatrix\Classes\PHPExcel\Reader\Excel5\Escher.php on line 173" appears and after hours of looking, I can't find a remedy.
